name: stonks
text: I have never used them, but whoever was driving not too long ago was a huge jerk and speeding very fast and cutting off people left and right. I hope they realize that they are representing a company, even when driving, as the company name is plastered all over the vehicle.

name: Hunter Davis
text: Jason at handyman of the Shoals is very professional. Gave me a great estimate and actually got the job done with a few dollars to spare!!! Can’t beat that. Love my new shower, the tile work was spot on!!!!

name: Mary Christian
text: We have lived in our Sweet Homes Alabama home by John Griggs for 4 months now.  We cannot overstate how thrilled we are with our new home and the amazing commitment to service that we have received from John and Karla.  As with any newly built home, we needed a few minor adjustments.  In each case we received immediate and highly effective responses from John and his contractors.  John was always available to answer our questions, listen to our concerns and go the extra mile to ensure he delivered on his commitments as well as the success of the project.  If you are looking for someone who is fair, competent, and focused on ensuring a quality home we highly recommend John Griggs!  Jamie and Mary Christian

resp.text: Thank you so very much Mary!! You and Jamie were such a pleasure to work with and made it easy to build an amazing home! We are so honored that you chose us to build for you and happy that you are so satisfied with us and your beautiful home!

name: Guy L
text: Great people to work with. Professional !

name: Kimmie Dee
text:
Overall pleasant experience with this company!

The ladies in dispatch were friendly, professional, and very easy to talk to.Text messages and emails were sent out, keeping me informed about my job.

That said... My job was scheduled, but then cancelled last minute, on two different occasions. Both times were rescheduled for the following day - Which was not too bad.

On the day that my crew arrived, I was a little surprised that it turned out to be a 'one-man crew'; however, Fabio had a very impressive work ethic. He was a hard worker; knowledgeable & very committed to his line of work. He was also very neat, and cleaned up the debris, as he worked. I was amazed at how quickly & efficiently he completed the job, on his own!

Overall, I am very pleased with the job that was performed, and I absolutely love, love my new Home Depot floors!

I would recommend this business.

name: Maya Spivey
text: I had two installations scheduled. They called the day of installation and rescheduled on two separate occasions. Really unprofessional. Installation when they came out and did the carpet was great.

name: Dianna Moore
text: Excellent experience.   Very grateful Danny and his crew were assigned to install our new flooring.  Timely, courteous, informative and picked up after each area of floor was installed.  Didn't wait until job was done.  I couldn't have been more satisfied! Danny even called the day after job was complete to make sure everything was ok, nothing overlooked and everything was left to my satisfaction.  I would recommend Danny and his crew all day long!  I will also request them if I have any more project come up.

resp.text: Thank you, Dianna, for sharing your experience.  Enjoy! :)

name: Brenda Davidson
text:
Every aspect of our carpet installation was handled professionally from
initial contact to follow-up to installation.  The technicians were punctual and installed the carpet quickly and expertly.  We are very pleased.  We would definitely use them again.

resp.text: Thank you, Brenda, for sharing your experience.  Enjoy your beautiful new carpet! :)

name: Donna Simmons
text: I left a more detailed review on Yelp. It was to lengthy for Google. This company is unprofessional.  Needs to improve on their scheduling.  Come up with off the wall excuses for everything.  After months trying to get a carpet install finished (all left was install of a 3 ft transition piece)I gave up and called a local installer that put down my kitchen floor. Romanoff was supposed to along with the carpet. But I didn't trust them in my house after the carpet installation. Hire local if you can. This company is a joke. They were sent by Home Depot.

name: Kathy Scruggs
text: They arrived on time, worked really fast and consulted us frequently along the way to make sure to address any questions or concerns they had. I highly recommend Danny and his team. They were excellent.

resp.text: Thank you, Kathy, for sharing your experience.  Enjoy :)

name: Will S
text: I’ll say the actual carpet installers were great and thorough. But the company canceled on me twice last minute and I had to keep taking off work. They said they would send me home depot gift cards each time they canceled - never happened.

name: Thomas Michael
text: On time,worked til job was done and I was satisfied

resp.text: Thank you, Thomas, for sharing your experience.  Enjoy! :)

name: Jeff Aycock
text: Was supposed to have carpet installed in a condo in Homewood yesterday (9/16) - I live in Nashville. We had hidden a key for entry. Called 4 times and left messages - never heard back from anyone - so........... not sure if carpet was installed or not. How do you run a business without calling your customer back?

name: Mike Compton
text:
After receiving a text at 8:05 verifying that the installer would be there between 11 and 2, I received a text rescheduling for the following Monday.  After calling, I learned installer called in and said he would not be at work.  No one in your office bothered to let me know.
You don't deserve a zero.  I cancelled the whole job.

name: Rachel Olis
text: Romanoff did a great job! They communicated with us throughout the entire process and were punctual and professional. They did a great job - the only reason I am giving 4 stars over 5 is because our baseboards were scratched in the process of installation and we will need to touch them up. Otherwise we were very pleased!

name: Terry Bell
text: They installed our new flooring and we are very pleased with the results.  The guys were friendly and professional.  They cleaned up after finishing the job.  We couldn't have asked for more.

resp.text: Thank you, Terry, for sharing your experience.  Enjoy your new flooring :)

name: ricky jones
text: Day one of installation they were supposed to be there between 8 & 11 at 11:30 they texted and said my time had changed from 12 to 3, they didn’t show at all and didn’t even have the courtesy to call. They wouldn’t answer the phone, I left several messages which they never returned. That night they sent a text saying they would be there in the morning. We had to sleep on the floor since we cleaned everything out of the bedroom except the big furniture. He arrived a little after 9 with no help to move the furniture, I had to help him. It’s a good thing Adolfo did a good job or they would have gotten zero stars

name: Courtney Adams
text: Horrible customer service. Three times they were supposed to show up and didn’t. Just having them inspect my flooring from a previous flooring install they did that I’ve had nothing but problems out of. No way would I ever use them on my own but I’ve bought flooring through Home Depot and this is who they use. I will be sure to never recommend your company and tell everyone to not use them.

name: Callie James
text: They did a good job installing my carpet.

resp.text: Thank you, Callie, for sharing your experience.

name: Chris Horwedel
text: Very professional, high quality work.  I had some issues getting the job site prepared, but Mike and Kim were helpful and effective at solving the problems and getting it done.

resp.text: Thank you, Chris, for sharing your experience with our team.  Enjoy the new flooring :)

name: Sharon Coleman
text: On time. Friendly, efficient and professional service. Love my new carpet!

resp.text: We love that you shared your experience with us, Sharon!  Enjoy the new carpet :)

name: Lisa Hall
text: Did a great job!

resp.text: Thank you, Lisa, for sharing your experience.  Enjoy :)

name: Michael Guthrie
text: Second time having carpet installed through H.D. workers were prompt , professional,  informative, finished job promptly. I strongly recommend H.D. for your home needs & wants. And R.R. to do the job.

name: Louis Cummings
text: Crew arrived on time, did a professional job, and left the work site clean. Very impressed with the company and employees.

resp.text: Thank you, Louis, for sharing your experience.  Enjoy your new flooring :)

name: Monique Houle
text: Very pleased with the installation. I would highly recommend the professionalism of the gentleman who installed and any other staff I dealt with in regards to this installation.

name: Timothy Wayne Brown
text: The crew was very professional. They arrived on time and had the flooring installed before they left. Courteous and cleaned up any mess before leaving.

resp.text: Thanks Timothy! #InstallHappiness

name: Gina Harris
text: My installers were very professional, knowledgeable and worked very hard and quickly. Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you Gina!

name: qb1_7 Wanderful1
text: Welcome to Gboard clipboard, any text you copy will be saved here.

name: FRAN WHEELING
text: Exceptional service!

resp.text: Thank you, Fran!

name: Melanie Williams
text: I had a positive experience prior so hired Kevin again. I tried to reach him to make things right and could not reach him via phone or text. My flooring was cut incorrectly. I have numerous spots where you can see the slab. Toilets were not correctly re-installed. House was left a total mess. Floors were filthy, grout and sand and debris left in my sinks and tubs. Trim was not replaced where it belonged. Hole was made in my bedroom wall, was repaired, not great. I felt I was taken advantage of regarding charges to remove subfloor. I questioned the high rate and was told it was because it could take days, it took hours yet I wasn’t offered any relief.

name: Alex
text: Kevin is prompt and very professional. He arrived on time and notified me in advance when he would be here and what he would be doing. He tore out my old plastic master shower and tiled in a beautiful new one for me. The only negative is my water bill is going to go up because I love my shower now.10/10 highly recommended for tile in shower work.

name: Meredith Zywno
text: Kevin and his team recently replaced some laminate flooring in two rooms of our house with hardwoods. Kevin arrived on time and got the job done well within the expected timeline. He and his team were extremely courteous and professional, and his office manager was very easy to work with. We are very happy with how our floors turned out and will definitely be calling WCR in the future.

resp.text: Meredith, thank you so much for your positive review!

name: Dra Coleman
text: The quality of work is very poor.  The quality of work could have been mitigated if problems  we're shared with the owner when discovered.  You  can not suggest or make comments unless you pay for his and son mistakes.  This guy does not listen and have an answer for everything.  I would not recommend this company to anyone else.  I am having to hire someone else to correct his errors with the wood floors installed.

name: Larry Levitt
text: Kevin and his crew work hard to provide quality service in a polite, professional manner. I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Larry, thank you for your kind words! It was a pleasure working with you.

name: Caryn B
text: Kevin and his crew did an excellent job remodeling our bathtub into a walk in shower. He was kind enough, and patient enough, to work around our crazy hours and scheduling to get the job done. Only one little hiccup with the plumbing but he just called in another plumber and was back on track in no time! Job well done gentlemen!

resp.text: Thank you Caryn for your kind words! It makes us happy that you are pleased with our work.

name: Ivy Heffelfinger
text: Kevin made the entire process of a tile backsplash seamless. The job was on time, didn’t overspend on material and it was done beautifully. Will definitely keep them in mind for our next project

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Jennifer Greer
text: They redid our master bathroom shower and did such a beautiful job! Kevin was so great to work with and we could not be happier with the outcome!

resp.text: Thank you Jennifer!

name: Buddy Boggs
text:
Kevin came to my home in Meridianville as scheduled. He tore out the old tile and sub floor and then put down backer board and new tile. I found Kevin to be very professional, knowledgeable and friendly. All trash was removed and I am well pleased with the work.
William Boggs

resp.text: Buddy we appreciate the opportunity, glad you were pleased with the services provided.

name: Melissa Lloyd
text: KEVIN AND HIS CREW DID A FABULOUS JOB REPLACING MY WOOD FLOOR WITH PORCELIN WOOD TILE.

resp.text: Melissa it was a pleasure working with you, thank you for entrusting us with your project.

name: John Whitman
text: Outstanding work by Kevin and his team: prompt, fast but high quality, informative. Would hire them again.

resp.text: John, thank you for the opportunity and we look forward to working with you again.

name: Fred T
text: Beutiful work and on schedule.

resp.text: Fredrick thank you.

name: Jerome Roberts
text: Michael and Drew came out to our house-30 minutes early-and found nothing wrong with our drain pipes. They both gave my wife and I peace of mind and didn’t try to rip us off with unnecessary work. I would HIGHLY recommend 911 plumbing and we will always be using them should the need arise. Thank you!!

name: Brett Coker
text: Great service and response time.  Kept me informed of when they were coming and were right on time.  Professional service from the office personnel and Drew, our plumber, was very thorough and professional.  Highly recommend this company.  Thanks Drew!!

name: Wayne Walker
text: Outstanding young man owns the company & is very conscientious about his work...honesty & integrity is important to Bret.  He came immediately to help me during a bit of a crisis, made the repair quickly & explained the issue thoroughly.  And in my opinion,  for a very good price.  I highly recommend calling 9-1 Plumb for any issues.

name: Glen Deal
text:
I called 9-1 Plumb on a Tuesday and made an after hours appointment for Thursday (all they had available at the time). I told the "dispatcher" Renee (sp?) that I had a water meter ripped out of the ground by Hurricane Sally and that I needed new meter re-installed in ground, hooked and entire new line ran to house. Requested that if anything opened up between Tuesday and Thursday to notify me.

Thursday morning Brent contacted me and said he would scope out the job and call me back. Within 15 minutes he called with a description and plan to solve the issue and that his crew (Drew and Nolan) could be onsite within an hour or so and complete the entire job by end of day.

Drew and Nolan arrived as scheduled with all necessary equipment (to include trencher) to complete the job and restore services to my home.

All of the members of 9-1 Plumb, Brent, Drew, Nolan and Renee were exceptionally professional, friendly, timely and most of all - customer service oriented.

I couldn't have asked for better.

We very much appreciate their work and most highly recommend them!!!! They will be my first call for any future issues!!!!

name: Mitch Pinkston
text:
If you are looking for a fair, honest, and professional plumber, call 9-1 Plumb.

Brent, the master plumber, explains every step of the repair process, and he ensures that the job is done in a timely fashion.  Due to poor pipes used by the homebuilder 10 years ago, our house experienced multiple leaks last fall.  Brent responded within a couple of hours of our call and was able to locate and repair the issues.  Eventually, 9-1 Plumb completed a re-pipe of our house.  We received multiple bids, and they completed the re-pipe in a quick and clean manner while also being the most cost-effective option for me.

This week our original grinder pump stopped working when it met its life expectancy (10 years).  Brent thoroughly checked every part of the grinder pump system to try to find the least costly repair.  Unfortunately, the pump was shot and a replacement was needed.  Brent was able to have a new pump and assembly installed the very next day.

I will call Brent at 9-1 Plumb for all of my plumbing needs.

name: Coy Buckley
text: Prompt service and great commmuncation by Lisa and the team. Thank you!

name: Deb T
text: Called and spoke with Brent for a leaking hot water heater. He told me what to do until he could get here. Professional, caring and quality service. Integrity pretty much sums it up. Thank you!

resp.text:
Thank you for taking the time to give us your review.  We strive for excellence in everything we do.  It is truly our customers that make our jobs worthwhile.  We are here if you need us!
The staff at 9-1 Plumb

name: Nicole Michaels
text: Friendly staff and fantastic prices.

name: Teresa Kidd
text: Definitely recommend 9-1 Plumb. Very quick service and our call was late afternoon. Professional, courteous and friendly. Had our plumbing problem solved quickly. Will certainly call Doug Mitchell for any future plumbing issues.

name: Stan Stabler
text: 9-1 Plumb exceeded my expectations. They were very helpful and did a great job. They ripped out an existing shower and installed a new culture marble showers. All the workers were very nice and polite and always left the job site clean. I highly recommend this company.  If I have plumbing needs in the future they will be the one I call.

name: Paulette Bullin
text: Replaced my outdoor leaking faucet and it hasn't leaked since :) Brent and Chandler were true professionals, knew exactly what to do and did a great job. They arrived the same day I called and seemed it didn't take very long for them to do the repair. By the way and very important, the price for the work was reasonable. Highly recommend.

name: Debra Mahanay
text: The whole experience was great.  Kind receptionist and excellent service.  Reasonable price.  Will recommend and definitely call for future needs .

resp.text: On the behalf of our staff at 9-1 Plumb we want to thank you for your great review.  We strive for excellence in every aspect of our company.  It is our customers that make this all worth while.  Thank you for your business.

name: David Chew
text: We had a clogged toilet drain in our master bath. It has been backing up about once a month for a while. These guys came in and got to work right away. They did not stop until the drain was clear. They went through the toilet first, then the sink, then the shower, and then back through the toilet, and then up through the clean out located on the outside of the house. After all of that they went back to their office and pick up the "BIG" machine. Once they got back they ran it once through the toilet drain where it ran into the clog and cut through the major clog and clearing the pipe. We watched at the outside clean out as the nasty clog pushed on through and out to the sewer. Then we saw nothing but clear water after that. No problems since then.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us such a positive review.  We understand our customers concerns and try to take care of them in a professional and timely manner.  We are here if you need us.

name: Samantha Pinkston
text: I can't say enough good things about Brent and D.  I called 9-1 Plumb when we had water coming up through our hardwood floor. The dispatcher initially said they wouldn't be able to get to us until the next day, but called when they had an opening later in the day since I had mentioned I wanted same day. We had a different plumber out earlier who told us at best we were going to need a costly repair or at worst would need to redo the plumbing in the entire house.  When the source of the leak wasn't obvious, Brent was thorough in figuring out what was actually leaking and was able to do the repair easily and for a very reasonable price. 9-1-Plumb saved us thousands of dollars. I highly recommend and will use them for all our future plumbing needs.

name: Jennifer Davis
text:
We just moved in our new home and woke up with plumbing issues with two small children. Lisa and Daniel went above and beyond to accommodate us quickly. They were fast,  efficient and extremely friendly. I would highly recommend this company and if I have further issues they will be my first and only call.
Thanks again,
Jennifer Allbritain

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us such a wonderful review.  We strive for excellence in everything we do.  It is truly our customers that make our jobs worth while.  Welcome to the neighborhood and call us if you ever need any plumbing needs.

name: Patrick Brindle
text: I'm shocked at the efficiency, friendliness and honesty we received from 9-1 Plumb today. Their operator/dispatch team (Lisa) was on the ball and quickly scheduled us. Our Plumber Brent thoroughly checked our hot water heater, targeted the problem, gave a competitive quote and made sure the problem was fixed. We'll be calling them again for future plumbing needs. Thanks Brent and Lisa!!!

name: Carli Ferguson
text: Lovely company and people! Everyone I spoke to was very friendly. Very fast install and at a great price. Definitely recommend this company and I will be using them in the future!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us your review.   It is always wonderful to hear from our customers.  We are here if you need us.  Thank you

name: Knox McMurphy
text: I can’t express how satisfied I was on two occasions  using 9-1 Plumb... Brent was so professional and knowledgeable about every aspect of our plumbing situation ... I definitely will continue to use this company for all my plumbing situations...

resp.text:
On the behalf of the staff at 9-1 Plumb, we want to thank you for taking the time to give us such a positive review.  We do strive for excellence in everything we do and customers such as yourself make it all worth while.  If there is anything we can do to help just give us a call.

Thank you for your business.

name: Amanda Newsom
text: Brent and Jake were on time, professional, knowledgeable, explained everything and gave different options to make the best decision for the repairs needed. Not pushy in the least bit nor intimidating. I highly recommend them!

name: Mikaylla Raymond
text:
Was having some problems with my garbage disposal, so after hearing great reviews around town, I called these guys! They were able to come that day and were very friendly, even greeted my dogs, pet them, and accepted the 1,000 kisses they try to give to everyone!
They got straight to work, found the problem, and quickly fixed it! Professional, quick, and a great staff! Definitely will call them with any issues I have in the future!

resp.text: I am pleased to have earned the positive reviews.  We look forward to providing you with the future services you may need! P.S. We love pets!!!

name: Zach A
text: The Customer Service is outstanding. First Plumbing Business I called told me to call someone else because they had no one on staff and the last 2 didn't answer. They answered quickly and were very knowledgeable. Doug helped fix our problem the same day we had the issue. I look forward to calling them again when I have a problem.

resp.text: On the behalf of everyone at 9-1Plumb, we want to thank you for taking the time to put in your review. We strive for excellence and to keep all our clients happy. We look forward to servicing your plumbing needs in the future.

name: Skip
text:
Brent, Jake and Vic showed up on time, kept us posted on arrival time. Brent was extremely professional, explaining what was causing the various issues in both baths of the home we brought the week before.

Because of scheduling conflict, the 9-1 Plumb flip flopped with the company installing shower doors in both baths.

Very reasonable professionals, will recommend to family, friends and strangers!

resp.text: On the behalf of everyone at 9-1Plumb, we want to thank you for taking the time to put in your review. We strive for excellence and to keep all our clients happy. We look forward to servicing your plumbing needs in the future.

name: Graham Calvert
text: 9-1 Plumb are great!   Doug and Shane came out within an hour of my call and gave me a bid that beat the other two top Mobile plumbers significantly.  After agreeing to the work they were at my house the next morning with heavy duty equipment and replaced the entire sewer and fresh water lines.  The job went smoothly, and they kept me posted through out the process.  They were very thorough in making sure everything looked perfect and cleaning up.  Very professional guys doing honest work, couldn't be happier!

name: Mark Wotli
text: Great plumber, showed up on time and very professional.  Answered all my questions and was knowledgeable and did a great job.  I would highly recommend Doug.  And they even cleaned up and took out the leftover boxes and trash created by changing out the faucets....Nice!

resp.text: Thank you very much for your review.  We strive to provide quality service with an exceeded level of professionalism.  We are here for any plumbing need that may arise.  It was a pleasure to provide you with the service that you needed.

name: Damian Rehorn
text: Quick service with Brent. He came out that day and fixed the issue. 2 days later when a similar issue surfaced, Brent was out again and had me squared away quickly. Never want to have to call a plumber again but if I do, I know who I will call!

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Rehorn for the review.  We strive for excellence in all that we do.  Please let us know if there is anything else we can do fore you.

name: Elizabeth Steele
text: Doug replaced the natural gas regulator on our hot water heater which had been humming loudly. While not on the original request, they also flushed both hot water heater tanks.  These guys are efficient and friendly -- now that we found them, we wouldn't use anyone else for our plumbing work including repairs or re-model projects.

resp.text: Wow that was very kind of  you and we appreciate  your  input. And know worrying  we will be here whenever you  need  us rain sleet or snow. Remember  10% off your next visit . Thanks so much  for  your  business.

name: Emma Ard
text: Great experience with this company! The customer service is unmatched. Brent and Jeff fixed a broken pipe at our meter box then later that day we had another issue and Brent and Jeff were at my house within an hour to fix it.  Even though it took an additional two hours out of their day they kept emphasizing it was not an issue and they wanted to make sure they had the problem fixed before they left. I cannot express how much their good attitude and customer service meant to me! Will definitely be calling them in the future with any plumbing needs!

resp.text: On the behalf of everyone at 9-1Plumb, we want to thank you for taking the time to put in your review. We strive for excellence and to keep all our clients happy. We look forward to servicing your plumbing needs in the future.

name: Taylor Bell
text: Very fast and professional! Fixed the problem in under 10 minutes- in and out in no time. This is my second time using them and they are my go-to plumbers. (Please drive the 9-1-Plumb  ambulance out next time. i need to see that beaut up close and personal)

resp.text: Thank you so much for your appreciation  we will be there 24/7 365 a year to give the same efficient tidy service and not a problem  show up with the lights on  thanks Taylor

text: Doug, with 9 1 plumbing was fabulous!  He fixed a hot water problem that several other plumbers attempted to fix and couldn't.  Fair and honest and very reasonable pricing! I highly recommend him!

name: samantha davis
text: We had to have our whole house replumbed and a new water  heater installed a few months ago. I can't say enough nice things about 9-1 plumb. They were friendly, fast, competent and anything we had questions about they took the time to explain to us. I would definitely recommend them to anyone who needs a plumber.

resp.text: On the behalf of 9-1 Plumb, we want to thank you for taking the time to give us such a positive review.  It is our customers that make our business the success it has become. name: Vicki Boyd
text: Doug and Jake arrived within about an hour and repaired my emergency leak in no time!  Quick. Efficient. Competent. Reasonable. Thank you 9-1 Plumbing!

resp.text: Thank you Ms.  Boyd for choosing us to help you with your project and your kind words. It was a pleasure  to  have worked for you and we will be there when and if you ever need us again 24/7 365 days a year

name: David Chew
text: We had a great experience with 9 - 1 Plumb plumbing! We had a clogged drain in our house and all three bathrooms were backed up. These guys came the same day I called them for help. They promptly showed up and  started to snake the problem areas and didn't stop until all drains were working well.

resp.text: On behalf of all our staff at 9-1Plumb we would like to thank you for taking the time to post your review.  We strive for excellence & are please to know we were able to meet your plumbing needs.  We hope we can be of service to you in the future.

name: Leigh Davis
text: Thank you so much to Brent and Jeff for fixing my plumbing problem. I  called at 08:15 this morning and Brent and Jeff were at my home by 08:50 and were done with the job by 09:30.They were extremely professional and quite proficient in their field of work. The issue with the plumbing was diagnosed in 5 minutes. In this day in age time is precious. I'd just got through working double shifts this weekend at the hospital and the last thing I wanted to do today is deal with a plumbing problem or having to wait around all day for a serviceman to arrive. Thanks to 9-1 Plumb in a little  over an hour from when I first called the problem has been fixed and I can relax.

resp.text: On the behalf of everyone at 9-1Plumb, we want to thank you for taking the time to put in your review. We strive for excellence and to keep all our clients happy. We look forward to servicing your plumbing needs in the future.

name: Mark Thompson
text: Doug and his crew responded quickly. The quote was competitive and included three options for my water line in. I was having trees removed and stumps ground out, and they coordinated the work with my tree service. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Mark we appreciate your review and will continue to bring you excellent work at a fair price.

name: Janet Hoffman
text: They are professional, prompt and experienced.  This was the first time they helped us and I won't call anyone else.  The installed a Kohler bidet/toilet with no problem.  I was fearful initially that this would be a unique install for them.   It was installed without a problem and works beautifully.   Thank you so much.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your business. We will continue to bring you the best work with quality products. Your words are very kind and it was a pleasure doing business with you.

name: Georgia Brown
text: I would highly recommend this company!! I had what I thought was a leaking water heater in my rental house. Water was getting under the laminate flooring. I called Doug after hours. He answered promptly and answered all my questions and said he could come the next day. My renter and I had shut off and drained the water heater. He was there at the time he promised with his co worker Jeff.  They discovered I actually had a slab leak! He gave me a quote that was much less than I expected and said they could start the next day. Brent and Jake came the next morning on time and ready to work. They worked all day with only a short break. They were courteous and professional and also very neat and respectful and careful not to disturb my renter's personal belongings. The job was a 2 day job and they came first thing the next morning to complete their work and worked this day until they finished without taking a break. They showed and explained to me everything they had done. You could hardly tell there had been any work done at all, everything was so clean!! Sorry to write a book, but having these guys do this job made a very stressful situation much less so!! I can't praise them enough and they will definitely get my business in the future!!  Georgia B.  Fairhope, Al

resp.text: On the behalf of everyone at 9-1Plumb, we want to thank you for taking the time to put in your review. We strive for excellence and to keep all our clients happy. We look forward to servicing your plumbing needs in the future.

name: Dayna G
text: Had an issue with tankless water heater, shower going cold at irregular times....they came out, flushed the system (which i also did the following day) took 6 minutes...was charged 200. Pretty ridiculous...tech said it was so black and dirty....not true and did not fix our issues.....had them come back...was told to just shut off and turn back on breakers....oh wow...seriously....made no attempt to even open unit or go to next procedure to fix....HE Had no clue.!!! Why waste my time and money....just tell your customers from beginning that 9 1 plumb  has no experience with tankless water heater....instead of robbing customers for an easy buck....i was supposed to here back from him shortly....its been 2 weeks.....unprofessional....inexperienced and a rip off....

name: Marissa Thetford
text:
We've used Doug and his team twice and have had a great experience both times.

The first time he repaired a leak in the laundry room behind our washer which caused flooding into our kitchen. He responded quickly, after hours (at night on a weekend), and dina great job.

Today we called on him again to install a garbage disposal in our kitchen and check a leak behind our master bathroom toilet. The disposal was easy, but the bathroom was a bit trickier since he didn't know what he would find behind the wall. He walked me through the steps he was taking and provided a price range based on what he might find once he got started which was helpful. (That way we knew what the high end might be if damage was extensive or the repair was more complex than anticipated.) Thankfully, it wasn't as bad as it could have been and itwas easily fixed in one visit.

The 9-1 team is on time, professional, and affordable. Doug and his team were also very clean while working on the repairs which was much appreciated. I'd strongly reccomend the 9-1 team to anyone in the area looking for a reliable plumbing team.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your recommendation! We strive to offer quality professional plumbing work. We are pleased that were able to provide these services to you and will be there if needed again!!

name: Kat Hobson
text:
I was looking for a small countertop & not having a lot of success within my budget. I stopped in here & was browsing when a young man asked if he could help. We went out in the rain (I was dressed for it, he wasn’t) to see what would work. He found something I loved, worked up my quote & made sure I had no more questions. When I placed my order with Tabitha I found that the young man was the owner of the business. Everyone who works there was professional, patient & outstanding at their job. The installation had a minor hitch that was handled immediately & well. .

I would recommend this company for any project of any size. The attention to detail, the customer service experience, the employees’ efforts to make sure everything is exactly right was great for me with my quick little remodel. I’ve found that these qualities tend to be universal when the whole company shares them. This one does.

name: Melissa Griffith
text: Wonderful company, crew was very professional  and did great work. Thank you to Tabitha for taking such good care of us.

text:
THE WORST customer service experience!
Dropped in early Feb 2021 met with Tabitha
Picked out my tops and paid 1/2 up front.
1st 2 steps went smooth
1st taking my money.
2cond . Template.
Install date 3/31
After driving 5hrs one way the day before
No show No CALL I reach out to Tabitha
I was told they tried to install my tops 2 weeks
earlier and since they couldn’t because of flooring
being done at that time that she canceled my original
Install date and the new date would be 4/6/2021
After driving 5hrs again for installation this is what
I got !!!
No Show!!!!
No Call !!!

text: LOUSY CUSTOMER SERVICE: I ordered quartz countertops for my kitchen and 2 bathrooms. First the installers left my home a total mess with dust outside and inside the house. I have been trying to find a grid a for my kitchen sink to prevent dent and scratches so I called them for information on manufacturer and brand so I can order the correct grid, they had no information about what they sold me  and referred me to another company Triton stone group out of Loxey. I contacted Triton and they wanted the sink information and the radius of the sink. I am still waiting on Island Granite to respond. Their customer service is only good until you sign the papers.

The ReBath Happy Customer Team

text: The ReBath experence went wonderful, I just loves it. Installer did awesome, Installer listened to her about how she wanted it. Looks good. Would definitely recommend us. name: Jerry Hill
text: Top quality of the items installed and great service of the sales mngr and installers

name: John Hall
text:
We had Re-Bath come and give us an estimate.  They were going to replace the bathtub and toilet and tile the floor (not the walls) with rather large tiles.  They were also going to put a door in to separate one part of the bathroom from the other.  They were not going to touch the vanity, sinks, or walls.  This is about a 60 square foot bathroom.  Total estimate, $14,416.  A professional contractor and home builder told me later this is really about a $3,500 job, which is about what it's costing me by simply hiring labor separately and buying the materials myself.  Re-Baths estimate comes to about $200 per square foot.  That's twice as much as it cost to build a new home in this area.  The salesman was nice.  The products are limited, because they only work with a certain line.  Another big problem, yes, they will get it all done in a week, but they couldn't start until two months later.

In response to the owners response, I'm already well into my bathroom remodeling, which is costing me about $3,000.  If Re-Bath wants to improve, they can simply charge a fair amount for their services.  I would have been willing to pay up to double the amount it's costing me just to hire one company and let them do all the work.  But Re-Bath wanted to charge me quadruple.  Just because they can find people who don't know the cost of things to pay their prices, doesn't make it OK.

resp.text: John, we regret to hear that you had this experience with us. Here at Re-Bath Birmingham, we are always looking for ways to improve and we appreciate your input. If you would be willing, we would like to have you contact our customer support team at 800-426-4573  to discuss ways we can better serve you in the future.

name: M B
text:
Will put my experience in chronological order because it would be three pages if I did not.

Home Depot steered us to Re Bath

Re bath quoted $12,000 for shower stall replacement, independent contractor says at best  worth $6000

Shower tub flooring dented by Re bath installer and then lied about dent, and installed dented tub floor

Job completion 2 months instead of 3 days because of dented shower tub

On a change order credited $100 for a $1500 quote

Glass door hanging off the hinges 5 days after install completed
walls and floors are warped

Overall experience was negative and job costs twice as much as it would have by another contractor

resp.text: It's upsetting to hear that your experience was anything but stellar. Please contact our customer support team at 800-426-4573 when you have an opportunity, and we will be more than happy to try and turn your experience around.

text: The bathroom remodel looks great.  The workmanship is very good.  I was looking for a grade between good and great.  I was disappointed with the choices of material, but I now think it looks better than it would have if I had had a larger choice.  The professional they sent to supervise was very knowledgeable, competent, and very easy to deal with.  As was the main office when I had an issue. (of my own creation - a change to the original plan.)  It was more costly than I was expecting, and took a really long time.  But after speaking to friends who also had bath renovations, it was well within the going rate/time.

resp.text:
Hi Marilyn,

We appreciate the time you took to let us know about your experience with our company. It's wonderful to hear that your bathroom looks great and that you were pleased with the quality of work. We will let our team know that you found them to be very knowedgeable, competent, and easy to deal with. It's always nice to hear those words of encouragment, it means a lot to our team.

It was an honor serving you and we thank you for choosing ReBath!
The Re-Bath Team

name: Charles Adams
text: Just had a shower installed in my master bathroom. After the installer was done I notice 1.5 inches of opening across the shower door. I asked the installer was this supposed to be like this and he answered that's how the door came. I refuse to believe that a shower door is supposed to have that much opening at the top to let water spill out on the bathroom floor is acceptable. Either the installer was inexperienced or did not know what he was doing. I paid a lot of money and waited 11 weeks for a very unprofessional job. I will not use Re-bath for my other bathroom.

resp.text: Hi Charles, we appreciate your honest review. We set a high standard for ourselves, so we are disappointed to hear that your experience with us was not a positive one. Please contact our customer support team at 800-426-4573 at your earliest convenience so we may further assist you in working towards a resolution.

name: Sherril Watkins
text: After putting it off for a while, we finally got Rebath out to the house to update the old style bathroom. I definitely don’t miss my blue tub! We are definitely enjoying the new modern style bathroom they did for us. They rennovated the entire bathroom for us and it was a very nice experience. I definitely recommend them!

name: Isaac Nevaeh
text: Full remodeling was complete is record time and now it is BEAUTIFUL

name: Natalie Levy
text: All costs and repairs were included on estimate. They have my recommendation.

name: LUCY WATKINS
text: THIS WAS OUR FIRST REMODEL AND WE DIDN'T KNOW WHAT WE WANTED TO DO WITH OUR BATHROOM BUT WE KNEW IT WAS OLD AND WAS IN DIRE NEED OF A FACELIFT. WE WENT TO HOME DEPOT AND THRU THEM WE WERE CONNECTED TO RE-BATH.. MR. SMITH AND MR. CLINGING CAME TO OUR HOUSE WITH SAMPLES OF ALL THEIR PRODUCTS AND PATIENTLY HELPED US DECIDE EXACTLY WHAT WE WERE WANTING TO DO TO OUR BATHROOM.THE DAY FOR OUR REMODEL CAME SOONER THAN WE EXPECTED BUT WE WERE READY AND EXCITED TO START. IT ONLY TOOK 2 DAYS TO COMPLETE THE JOB. SEAN WAS OUR MIRACLE WORKER, HE TOOK THE TUB OUT ,THE WALLS IN THE AREA DOWN TO THE STUDS, REPLACED ALL THE PLUMBING THEN STARTED TO REBUILD FROM THE FLOOR UP. HE WORKED DILIGENTLY AND PROFESSIONALLY AND DID AN EXCELLENT JOB. BEFORE, I ALWAYS SHUT THE BATHROOM DOOR BECAUSE YOU CAN SEE IT  FROM THE FRONT DOOR ( WE HAVE A RANCH HOME) AND I WAS ASHAMED OF WHAT IT LOOKED LIKE. NOW I PROUDLY KEEP THE DOOR OPEN TO SHOW THE BEAUTY OF THE ROOM. WE WANT TO SAY THANK YOU TO ALL THE PEOPLE FROM RE-BATH WHO HELPED US COMPLETE OUR DREAM.

If the installer says it's ok for him to write on the product instead of putting tape on,
He is wrong the pencil will leave scratches that will never come off . Installer said that he would be fired if he fixed any damages to your house that he did .
I went with them because of Home Depot . I no longer shop at Home Depot because of Re-bath.

text: I called and ask for a job quote. They explained to me that I would need to complete a lengthy form in order to proceed as it was an investment property. I ended up going with another business that was happy to service my needs.

text: They did an amazing work but made a mistake on my floor when they didn't level it correctly. After I mentioned it the supervisor they had to replace the whole floor to fix it. For the kind of mistake they did, I expected them to run away but they made sure it was done right. I was worried at first but believe me, they did the right thing and that is hard to come by. Although they made a mistake and it cost extra time, they are a super super company for owning it and making it right! I would definitely recommend!

name: Theodore Chandler
text:
Fails to deliver. Possibility of being ghosted.

TLDR:
Request patch on back porch to prevent further floor joist damage
Company patches hole but it fails to seal against water leaks
Request company come back to fix patch
Company fails to deliver. Instead stops all contact with customer.

I accepted a proposal to repair a leak on my back porch and fix a floor joist which had been rotting due to the leak.
Work took place on February 20th while I was out of town. The floor joist was successfully repaired. Unfortunately when I got back and poured some water over the patch I found that it still allowed water onto the support.
I contacted the business owner (Devin Lanier) on February 25 by text message and by email on February 27th.
The business owner replied via email the next day stating "So sorry about that. Let me look at our schedule and I will get someone back out there to check it out ASAP".
The company scheduled an appointment for Sunday March 3rd to look at the leak. A storm came through the area on the day they were scheduled and I understand it would not have been possible for them to come out. Unfortunately no cancellation notice was communicated to me.
I reached back out by email on March 4th to ask again for someone to check on the leak and I was told "Yes a few of my guys were caught up up with the weather. Let me look at our schedule this week and try to get someone to cut loose and head over there. I’ll let you know. "

Since the email on the March 4th I have not received any contact from the company. I have tried many avenues of contact without success.
Including emails on March 9th, March 14th, March 18th and March 28th.
Phone calls to both the main number requesting call backs and the estimator number. None of which have been returned

name: Angela
text: Steve has been so helpful to me and my film crew. I recommend this company.

name: Ashley Bonner
text: Super friendly and helpful!  Was new to remodeling my home thing and the owner, Devin, walked me through it every step of the way.  He made me feel very confident in his skills and my bathroom looks great!  Would definitely recommend and use again.

text: Purchased tile and plumbing from Pro-Source outstanding experience. Scottie English was sales person she made it flow smooth and easy like purchased should.

name: Proud Parent
text:
I bought cabinets from ProSource at the end of August. The date of install would be Sept 1st - 5th. I am still waiting on Sept 25th for the cabinets to arrive. No date can be given... I have told them I am waiting to sell the house and the cabinets are costing me the mortgage. How long will I have to wait? No one can tell me. I have several interested buyers in the home right now. This company does not care about you or your project.

***UPDATE SEPT 29TH***
I had the pleasure to work with Trent a ProSource employee. He was great to find the answers for me that I did not have. I had the company delivering the cabinets calling me providing me updates directly. As a customer if I could go through ProSource myself I would. I appreciate the follow through.

name: John Lenart
text: Excellent service and very knowledgeable of their products.  The staff was very helpful and patient in helping us selected our countertops.  The installers were professional and answered all of our questions.  We had two bathrooms remodeled with Natural Stone and look forward to using them for our kitchen remodel as well.

name: D. Beville_ Brown
text: Nicole and Deanna were absolutely a pleasure to work with. Nicole has a great sense of color and design and helped me make informed decisions. Both ladies gave me excellent customer service consistently and I would highly recommend Natural Stone for kitchens, baths, fireplace surrounds, etc!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words! We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us—and we agree, Nicole is truly a gem to have on our team! We count ourselves lucky for customers like you and hope you are enjoying all of your new countertops!!

name: Deborra Byrd
text: Nicole was knowledgeable and professional.  The installation crew completed their work to a high standard, the seams in the granite were imperceptible.  I would highly recommend this company!

resp.text: We are grateful that you took the time out to leave us a review and to share your feedback on our entire team!  Their priority is to always make sure customers have a great experience! We are ecstatic that we met that mark! Kind folks like you make our job a pleasure!!

name: Sally Quinn
text: Catina went above and beyond to assist me in replacing the Formica countertops I inherited when I purchased my new home. She was there for every question and I couldn’t have asked for better service.

resp.text: "Thank you so much for this 5-star review. We really appreciate you being a customer and helping to share the word about us. It was a pleasure working with you!

name: Brandon Foote
text: Awesome experience! Thanks for making the process smooth and easy!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us a 5-star rating!  We take pride in knowing our customers are happy with the entire experience of getting new countertops!  We are always here if you need anything!

name: Andrew Patrick
text: These guys are good. Tolerances are 1/16th inch or better everywhere. We would buy from them again.

name: Denise Counts
text: Excellent customer service!  Very professional in all aspects from choosing the materials, having the template made, installation, and financial options. Also, from start to finish took only a couple of weeks!  Thanks to the whole crew. We are very happy customers!

name: Gwen Black
text: Very professional, easy to work with. Would use them again

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a nice review! So glad you had a great and easy experience on the installation of your countertops!  Our company values customer satisfaction a top priority! Thank you for choosing us!

name: Sue Morris
text: The Decatur office was a great help and Ginger had patience to answer lots of questions and let me decide on just the right granite for my kitchen. I priced numerous pieces before finding the “one”. I was able to see layout on the granite and get just the look I wanted. I definitely like the 15 year sealer put on it. They did an excellent job on installation. I am loving the new countertops.

resp.text: Thank you for entrusting us with your new kitchen countertops and for such a positive review of our company!  We are so glad you are happy...it was our pleasure working with you!

name: juanita moss
text: I went to Natural Stone a few months and the staff was very nice. I ordered one piece of granite for a 84" bathroom vanity. I ordered a remanent off of a slab there. I paid a 50% deposit and they were holding it for me. When it was time to be installed, they brought it for my vanity. Unfortunately they installed a piece that was not mine. I paid the balance of this in November and I wasn't ready for it until April. When I went by the shop to pick up a small piece for the shower, I was advised I still owed the other 50% as they didn't show it paid for.. Thank goodness I had a canceled check to prove I had paid for it. I contacted them and advised they had installed the wrong one.  They said they would call the owner, they have never gotten back to me with any kind of explanation at all.  It is installed with no explanation and no apology. Now it would cost me an extra fortune because I am not living in the house and the plumbers installed all the plumbing which would be another added expense to have it replumbed. An apology would have been nice, or they didn't have enough remanent left, or some kind of an explanation and give me another choice. I had no choice in the matter.  No I would not recommend them for any stone work.  After over 1100.00 for 84 inches, we sent them pictures of what we bought and what we had.  The only contact I have had since was they sent me the warranty with still no explanation whatsoever.   I have never been so disappointed in a company and I will never do business with them again. So my situation is this: live with it for the rest of my life or have a law suit and have the bathroom torn up again which has not even been offered..  I would give them a 1 in review

resp.text:
We’re normally known for our exceptional attention to detail, and we regret that we delivered less than your expectations. If I were in your situation, I'd be pretty upset too.  I'm so sorry we missed the mark on this.   Please rest assured we have addressed this with the team to ensure we improve on this.

If you're open to it, I'd like to make this up to you.  Please call me at 256-864-8050 so we can try and correct this for you!

name: Carla Baggett
text: Nicole from Natural Stone was great to work with and they did an excellent job on my quartzite marble!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review!  So glad Nicole was helpful on your project...I will make sure that she receives the recognition that she deserves!

name: kris matz
text: From help with design choices, to install,  a total professional company!   Beautiful countertops at a fair price!

resp.text: Thank you for such a wonderful review!  We strive to provide the highest quality and service...we are so glad you are pleased with the outcome!!

name: DJ Barber
text: Very professional.  Stone choices are amazing!

name: Steven Tate
text: Great service. Very helpful and easy to communicate with. Countertops look amazing.

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review....we enjoyed working with you and so glad you were happy!  It was our pleasure!

text: Ginger and the staff are great to deal with . Best price we found on  a particular quartz we wanted . Cambria. Color was Montgomery looks fantastic. Will recommend to anyone needing countertops.   Thanks

Friendly, cooperative, helpful

name: Abigail Hipps
text: Genesis renovations did our master bathroom (new tile shower, new flooring) and we are so happy we chose them. Brandon was our point of contact, and he communicated well throughout the whole process. Because of an unforeseen electrical issue, our project took longer than expected, but we were contacted and updated every step of the way. I recommend them to everyone, and I will give them a call for my next project!

name: Ann Titus
text: I want to give a big Shout Out! And Thank You! To Brandon Granger and John with Genesis Renovations for my beautiful bathroom!  They have been very easy to work with, show up when they say, communicate well and often and were spot on with their estimate!  Brandon and John are meticulous with their work as are their sub-contractors: Charlie the plumber and the tile guy.  From start to finish it only took a week!  Also want to thank Charlene Rumsey with Henry Tile for her patience and help in choosing the perfect tile. So if you need anything done at your house I would definitely recommend Genesis Renovations!

name: Waylazy
text: An Excellent and professional group of people to work with. Great quality of workmanship. GENESIS RENOVATIONS are now our go to people.

name: Carlos Puig-Garcia
text: Brandon came out to my house on Feb 2nd to give me a quote to repair a leaky window. He quoted me $50 which I thought was a great price. We agreed for the work to be done the following Tuesday on the 6th. Tuesday comes and no one shows up and no phone calls. I called repeatedly and never received an answer or return call.  I will be happy to change this review upon a suitable explanation but the lack of professionalism is disappointing as he did not come across that way at all.

resp.text: Mr. Puig-Garcia, we do apologize for this. We just became aware of this review recently and wanted to respond. This is certainly and unacceptable occurance and not normal for our business. While we aren't sure what was happening at that time, we do apologize. If you would, please give us a call and let us know what we can do to make this right. Thank you.

name: Ryan Reeves
text: Tri-Star construction was on time, reliable, professional and able to handle some change requests along the way.  I would use and recommend Tri-Stars services after my experience with this company.  The fence they built is perfect and the best built fence in the neighborhood.  They use galvanized metal framed gates which is a very nice touch and adds quality to the finished product I had Tri-Star build, which was a privacy fence with some custom changes to keep a escape artist of a dog contained.  10/10.

text: We absolutely  love  our porches.  We would recommend them, they were very professional.

name: Jonathan Harvison

name: Jim Davis
text: It was a great value for the dollar spent. I believe I got MORE than I paid for in service, communication and work quality. The kept me informed every step of the way. Honored all my requests, were on time and very professional. The job was done EXACTLY as I would have expected and then some. Very nice and patient with me (I can ask a lot of questions) and the ANSWERED all of them. I will most definitely use this place for ANY and EVERY home project I need done. It is refreshing to know a place still cares about the customer 1st, then the $$$. And here is a secret, if you do that the $$$ will come! Yes, VERY SATISFIED and I HIGHLY suggest you pick them as well, you will not be disappointed.

text: Forrest, Katelyn, and Xavier did a superb job. They did a professional installation of our Luxury Vinyl Tile. Thanks for a job well done!

name: Paula Pace
text: The installers did an excellent job and left my house very clean. I would recommend them to anyone .

name: Oneika Moore
text: This entire process has been a nightmare. We purchased materials through Home Depot and they assigned this group. From the initial scheduling to today- it’s been a mess. Our home has been in disarray for well over a month. At first it was- oh we didn’t know you had wood and carpet- the wood should go first. (Umm you scheduled it, how should I know- we just spent thousands on flooring for YOU to know) then we get Home Depot not ordering enough wood- installer has a medical problem, you’re on the schedule, but it’s tentative. Then add Tammy/Tracy “country bumpkin” Site Manager’s attitude trying to tell us exactly how many boards are left to do like she’s been in the house. Totally unprofessional group- if Home Depot ever assigns these people to do your work- SKIP IT! The actual installer guys were nice-but the management is SUBSTANDARD.

name: Edwin Rivera
text: People at Romanoff kept in touch along the way. Before the institution they called me to explain everything. They also sent me various emails confirming the day, carpet pattern and type of patting. My appointment was changed for two days prior to the original day, not before calling me and getting my approval. Very professional staff and excellent job.

resp.text: Thank you, Edwin, for taking the time to share your experience!  Enjoy your new flooring :)

text: Romanoff Renovations did an excellent job with our carpet installation. They were able to schedule us a week early and they were done with the whole job in 3 hours. We got 3 bedrooms and their associates closets done. They did a great job laying the carpet. If there are seams, I cannot tell where they are.

resp.text: Thank you, Cinda, for sharing your experience :)

Thanks

name: Derek Herscovici
text:
The first thing that let me know I had picked the right general contractor was Jordan Latimer’s attention to detail. Other GC’s weren’t willing to take the extra measurements, or recommend quality parts, or go the extra mile to make sure this project was done right.
When the renovation process began, he communicated the process every step of the way. He let me know where there were issues and promptly set about fixing them with almost no time lost. He helped me achieve my vision for this bathroom and shower remodel and brought in a team of specialists and experts to see it through to completion. He does nothing halfway and values your input too, instead of overriding your ideas. I have gotten to know Jordan a lot during this process, and he is not only a fabulous contractor, but a man of great heart and compassion. He understands people as well as he does home remodeling and does not skimp on either. I cannot reccomend him enough. YOU WILL NEVER NEED ANOTHER CONTRACTOR AGAIN.

resp.text: Thank you Derek! That was very kind of you to say those words. I take a lot of pride in my work and I will never take a shortcut to jeopardize the integrity of a job. It has been wonderful getting to know you and I look forward to the continuing work we have going forward from here. Once again your kind words are very much appreciated.

name: Anthony Spina
text: Jordan is a top notch contractor. He went well out of his way to make sure all of our needs were taken care of. He even fixed things we never asked him to fix at no additional cost. Jordan is a perfectionist and pays attention to every detail of his work. I would highly recommend him.

resp.text: Anthony, thank you so much for the kind words! I really enjoyed working for your great family and if you ever need us we are always here for you. Thanks again!

name: Ben Burnett
text: Jordan and his crew did a magnificent job.  Jordan is a honest guy, and his attention to detail in his work is second to none.  I trust him and his craftsmanship.  I knew it from the first time he came to do an estimate.  I would not want anybody else to do my work.  Our kitchen that they did is really beyond words.

resp.text: Thank you so much Ben! We are so very thrilled to know that y’all are happy with the kitchen. Looking forward to the future jobs and will get you guys some adjusted numbers just as soon as we can.

name: Tracy Witte
text: Jordan does excellent work and really prides himself in getting a job done correctly. We have hired his company for several jobs over the past 4 years and have always been extremely pleased with his work.  Unlike many local contractors, who are hard to track down, Jordan communicates so well, which makes it easy to work with him. He is *so* responsive by phone, text, etc. We recommend him highly to all of our local friends and will hire him again in a heartbeat for any future repairs/remodeling.

resp.text: Tracy, we are so thrilled that you are happy with the outcome of your new front door. It goes so well with everything on the house and this whole project has been a major transformation. You guys are some of my favorite people to work for and thank you so much for the kind words!!

text: Jordan recently did a countertop installation for us.  It was not a huge job but did require some creativity and ingenuity for this particular job. We are ready for him to do our next job.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Sforzini! We really appreciate the kind words and we will get you an estimate for the next job as soon as we are able.

name: Belle Winful
text: I don' t even know where to begin with this review. I wish I could provide all pictures of our home before and after the complete renovation to see how amazing of a job that was done. JL Remodeling & Home Repair made our home more beautiful than we even envisioned. What I love most about Jordan, the owner, is that he will not improvise the integrity of work being performed by cutting corners. He Is extremely detailed and takes so much pride in his work! You will see it the moment you hire him. He is trustworthy, resourceful, and extremely professional. From how fair and detailed our estimates were in the beginning, to our home being left spotless at the very end; you can have confidence in all work that is done. This is so important because you do not want just anyone handling something as valuable as your home. We are very grateful for him and his company and we will use them for any future remodeling or home repair needs.

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Winful. We really appreciate your kind words and enjoyed working with you guys so much during such an exciting time for your family.

resp.text: Mrs. Hale, you’ve been a pleasure to work with and we will gladly take on any projects you ever have.

name: John Schmidt
text: You might be happy with the price you are paying but materials are not that much and they are over charging. They charged my parents $7000 to replace a shower for one day work.   In addition when I talked to the owner in Virginia Beach (not local) about this he was rude and indignant.

name: Ms. E
text: Nathan arrived at my home timely, explained what he was going to do to remodel my shower, and did just that. I am pleased with my new shower and it looks exactly as I requested. He cleaned up after completing the job. I highly recommend Express Bath!

name: Donnie Hill
text: Nathan was very professional and clean. We had a great experience with sales and the installation I highly recommend. Thank you I would do business again.

name: Elayne Nosek

text: Trae did an excellent job was professional and the consultant made our sales experience easy and smooth. Very great company highly recommend.

name: Susan Fox
text: Express Bath has earned my thank you and appreciation for replacing my bathtub with a beautiful walk-in shower. name: Carol Mayes
text:
Express Bath was very professional, there worker Brandon was attentive & and on time. When we were in there while he was working, he explained to us the things he was doing . He was very nice , he cleaned up all the mess that he made. We were very pleased with his work & his performance . I would rackmend  this company to anybody. We had to have our tub taken out, my husband wanted a shower instead of a tub. So Brandon had to take out the tub & found our leak & fixed it. Then he put in the shower. it is beautiful, he did a beautiful job.
The shower looked glass it was so shiny, I loved his job, he is a great guy.

Phil & Carol Mayes

name: Nelson Martin
text: In about May 2020 Express Bath installed a new shower/tub for us. They sent one man to do a two or three man job. The guy worked hard. However, the tub was apparently too large and he had knocked a wall out of square, broke tile on floor which remains, and he glued a five inch board up against the tub (without permission) which makes the tub look very cheap and tacky. He said he couldn't removed the board because it was glued. Contacted office and they said would correct and get back to me. That never happened.  Individual said he never installed a tub before and said he worked only with showers.

name: Mathew
text: Salesman are amazing. The Installers take pride in there work. Made the process easy. Thank you Express Bath

name: Amy Hunter
text:
The most rude business owner I have ever encountered. I had a personal issue that was a family emergency leading to my needing to cancel and install. The materials had not shipped yet but the owner refused to cancel the order and despite my family emergency tried to “ sell” me another option with an extremely high interest rate.
In my opinion a long time “ family” owned business would pride themselves in costumer service. He was rude, argumentative, and plain nasty to me. I would never recommend this company to anyone because the way you treat your clients in situations of adversity speaks to who you truly are. Advertisements and products don’t show a true picture of a person, business, or how they choose to conduct business. Having this interaction with the owner was very upsetting considering my circumstances that I throughly explained. There was no compassion or empathy and he was strictly all about the money. That’s not a company I would choose to give my business too.

name: Scott Vandervelde
text: I highly recommend Clay Conrad and Conrad Construction. We had him remodel 2 full bathrooms, 1 half bathroom, install kitchen counter, kitchen sink, kitchen backsplash, as well as install flooring and light fixtures. The remodel looks terrific. I had to coordinate the work with him from 9 hours away. He was very responsive and very helpful. I never felt concerned about the remodel with Clay in charge. Clay is a professional who provides high quality work. He did all of this during a pandemic and had to manage work around effects of a hurricane. I will call Clay anytime we need something done, without even obtaining a quote from anyone else.

name: Zach Melton
text: I highly recommend Conrad Construction. They provided timely and quality service even after Hurricane Sally when contractors were overrun with work. I will definitely go to them for any future repairs/renovations!

name: Elizabeth Williams
text: Had Clay and his team at Conrad Construction do a project for us and we could not be more pleased with the outcome.   Major carpentry repair, complete exterior paint and also replacement of screened porch.  Clay and his crew were professional, timely and the craftsmanship was excellent.  Highly recommend.

name: Thomas Roberts
text: Great people to work with. Shower remodel completed on time with no problems. Highly skilled craftsmen who followed up with us every step of the way to make sure the job went smoothly.

name: Richard Del Sesto
text:
Conrad Construction has performed minor maintenance on my beach rental through the years through the rental management company, but I did not deal with Clay personally until I needed his help on two larger projects.  Clay surpassed my expectations both times.  The first time was when I asked him to remove the dated ceramic floor tile and carpet in my vacation rental.  The house is on pilings and had settled quite a bit causing a very wavy floor surface.  I was not sure it could be fixed without major reconstruction.  Clay's crew came in, quickly removed the old tile and carpeting, leveled the existing floors and installed a beautiful porcelain tile.  They were exceptionally fast and efficient in getting the job done on time between beach guests.

The second time was when I asked him to address further settling issues with the concrete pad under the house which caused large areas of ponding.  Clay once again came in and quickly and efficiently framed for the new concrete, had it poured and leveled, and he did it all again between beach guests.  I have used several contractors in Gulf Shores, But Clay will be the first one I call from now on for ANY project, large or small.  Clay is professional, easy to talk to and above all, he has proven to be more than qualified and an honest contractor.  He is a rare find.

name: Chelsie Sotero
text: Clay at Conrad Construction is the best around! Always available to answer calls, any questions you have at any time, customer service is A + and their work all around is something you don't see very often! I would highly recommend anyone call & use them as you will get exactly the service you would like to receive!!! Thank you Conrad Construction for all your wonderful work!!

name: Fred Gerow
text: Clay and his crews totally transformed our old master bathroom into a modern spacious area of comfort.  They were easy to work with and very accommodating.  One of the best estimates for the job and well worth every penny.

text: I contacted Conrad Construction for a project in Guld Shores. Clay was on time and professional. The project went great and his work on the kitchen project was top notch. Their work is exceptional and their customer service is second to none. I would highly recommend Conrad Constuction for any of your home improvement needs. ( I would give 6 stars if I could)

name: DONNA HIGGINS
text: Clay did a total remodel of our condo at SeaChase in Orange Beach, AL. We are very pleased with the work. He finished on time and did everything we asked.

name: stewart whitham
text: very professional and capable. Clay Conrad exceeded our expectations for the renovation job we had.

name: Trillene Baird
text: Got the job done on time but cut lots of corners. The quality of work in areas of my complete remodel is pathetic. We had Clay do a complete remodel of a 1983 condo. He not only left us with work that needed to be redone but he did not pull permits with the city and cut corners to save on his cost. The paint and trim work is the most frustrating and disappointing of all. Areas of trim were left short in doorways and a single coat of watered down paint was “splashed “ on the walls. I paid to have the walls textured and the visual inconsistency is disgusting. There are multiple areas where the paint is not complete and behind the toilet was left unpainted too. The 1980s faceplates were left on the outlets and painted around. The outside doors were changed out but not painted either. I guess the factory primer was good enough? Same for the crown molding...factory primer again. A water leak occurred from the painter not paying attention created damage to the unit below us as well.  We had him replace the old AC unit and duct work moved from the floors to the ceiling. The power cord supplying the AC wasn’t replaced to meet code and I had to pay someone to fix the issue after the job was complete. Electrical outlets were left dead and the microwave was mounted flush under the cabinets preventing ventilation. The knobs to the faucet sink weren’t even screwed on. I’m out more money to fix what should have been taken care of by my contractor. I understand that projects don’t always come out the way you want but the texture, trim and paint job done on this job is unacceptable by anyone’s standards. I asked him to fix this but heard nothing. Therefore I’m writing this review. Hope this saves the next person from making the same mistake.

resp.text: Unbelievably difficult owner :) told me at closing they loved it and paid in full.

name: Harold Burkett
text: Super nice guys and they do great work. Installed tile in my kitchen and dining room. They were very informative and helpful. Great job guys and thanks.

text: Noelle and her team did an excellent job after my kitchen and living room sustained water damage. They stayed in touch with me during the entire process and made it so easy! It was very professional, and the work was excellent!

name: Angelk B
text: The Paul Davis Restoration company is absolutely awesome! They did an excellent job on my house from start to finish, after I had experienced a water leak. They came out to my home and performed the mitigation process and dried my house out. They packed my household goods up and started the reconstruction process. My house looks brand new now! The team had to put in new drywall; pull up and install all new hardwood floors and floor boards; and paint my house. I was very nervous about this project, but they made it so easy for me by keeping me well informed on the entire process. They were very professional; timely; detailed and they all worked well together as a team. I was amazed at the amount of time it took for them to perform all of my work needed. I would like to thank Dennis, Miguel, Eric, Abraham and all of the contractors and everyone that was involved with my project. In addition, I had to go by the Paul Davis office and the staff there was also very friendly and professional. This company is well managed, and it shows! I am so glad Paul Davis was here for me! I will tell everyone about this company’s performance!

text: Daniel and his team were amazing to work with.  From the first meeting to the last they are detailed oriented and listen to what your wants and needs are and will go above and beyond to make it happen.  The contractor used for the repair was CFS Flooring and that team was amazing.  The owner was there daily to walk thru with you and let you know what was going on and if there are any issues and fix issues right then.  I cant say enough about Paul Davis and their crews.  I have already recommended them to several friends and will continue.  People that see the work they did are amazed.  Great job guys.  Keep up the good work.

resp.text: Hi Steven - Thank you so much for the kind words and recommendations. Please let us know should you ever need anything from us!

name: Willene Smith
text:
Without question and without peer, Paul Davis Restoration of Huntsville, AL and Lead Project Manager Mr. Brian Henson, whom I call Commanding General, and the entire Staff have been nothing but SUPERB for 6 water damage claims in our home since 2017.  Every intricate detail from the paper work to the water mitigation, mold mitigation, and reconstruction has unequivocally been done with astute meticulous attention to detail.  Every payment is tracked with precision and every aspect of all the six repairs have been done to PERFECTION!!!  I had never heard of Paul Davis until USAA recommended them to us for our first water damage claim that occurred August 2017.  The most recent one was earlier this year for water damage in the kitchen and the roof.  Over 500 sq of ceramic tile had to be replaced and black mold removed from the kitchen and the crawl space due to a break in the water line from the dishwasher and internal water leaks in the kitchen area windows coming from the roof.  I can't say enough about the professional acumen led by Mr. Brian Henson and the entire Team of Professionals at Paul Davis - Huntsville, Alabama!!  They have my VOTE and Pledge to take care of any claims or normal reconstruction for my home now or in the future.

Regards,

Willene Smith Orr (AKA - PVT Smitty)
Sergeant Major, US Army Retired

The construction team came in and got that done and before you know it I had beautiful new floors and baseboards and I could finally put this nightmare to rest. Thankful to Josh, project manager, for all his hard work. He communicated with me throughout this entire process and was very polite and accommodating to our schedules and various needs. Nobody ever expects to have a disaster but if you do please don’t hesitate to call Paul Davis Restoration and let them take care of all your needs from start to finish.
